# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a furnace, but the furnace position is not available
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) and a furnace, but the furnace position is not available

### Copper cable factory
No information available about the factory

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system
Consists of multiple transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5), (x=64.5, y=-53.5) and possibly more, but exact connections are not available

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
- Ensure that the burner equipment has fuel before using it
### Errors when using inserter without source items
- Ensure that the inserter has source items before using it
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
- Ensure that the furnace has ingredients before using it
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the power grid before using it
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
- Ensure that the pipe group has fluid before using it
### Errors when using electricity group without electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into the electric network before using it
### Errors when using belt group without items
- Ensure that the belt group has items before using it

# NAMESPACE
No information available about the namespace, utility functions, or variables.
